text: Events from the year 1520 in India. ==Events== 19 May – The Battle of Raichur is fought. ==Births== * Francisco Barreto, later viceroy of Portuguese India is born in Faro (dies 1558) * Appayya Dikshitar, performer of yajñas is born at Adayapalam, in the Tiruvannamalai district (dies 1593) ==Deaths== ==See also== * Timeline of Indian history ==References== India
title: 1520 in India
